Items.text: Can I ask you for a quick favor?
Items.name: Ms Nice

Items.text: My buddy there in the bank, it's his birthday tomorrow.
Items.name: Ms Nice

Items.text: And I wanted to come in and set up a little suprise party for him tomorrow.
Items.name: Ms Nice

Items.text: Do you think you could tell me what time he gets in tomorrow?
Items.name: Ms Nice

Items.text: I want to make sure everything is set up before he gets there.
Items.name: Ms Nice

Items.text: Oh, and don't bring up his birthday! I don't want him to get suspicious.
Items.name: Ms Nice
